document.full_text: mohamed bin hammam received a boost to his campaign to become fifa president when he was backed by his former foe and ex-fifa executive committee member chung mong-joon tuesday.
document.title: chung backs bin hammam in fifa presidential race
lines_and_colors: mohamed bin hammam received a boost to his campaign to become fifa president when he was backed by his former foe and ex-fifa executive committee member chung mong-joon tuesday.
